Counter Strike Source is basically the same game as the original Counter Strike except this time its on the Source engine. Which means... You guessed it! Bodies flying thanks to grenades! And aside from the graphical improvements thats really all i can say. Oh and AI support too that the original CS did not have but Condition Zero did have it so i'm not sure if thats a bonus point or not. Either way one thing is for sure playing with the AI in this game is a lot more fun compared to playing with the AI in CS: Condition Zero.

+Surprisingly there is still servers available. I suppose its not that surprising considering even the original game still has a lot of players in it...
+The game looks awesome. I would even say it looks better then CSGO. The original CS has nice graphics too but thats mainly because those graphics are a classic. While in here the game just looks good. It looks really good.
+Classic maps, classic guns, classic skins... Nothing to complain about.
+Playing with the AI is a lot more fun. The original game did not have AI. Condition Zero added AI into the game however it was a bit... meh. I was happy to be able to play against the AI but the gameplay itself, the matches were just really limited and weird. In here you just open up any map, no choosing friendlies with different skills or trying to complete objectives just load up a map and bam you're playing the classic Dust 2 with AI. You can have a lot of AI too.

+/- The gunplay is really fun except you don't really feel like you hit anyone. The AWP is, of course, incredible and tons of fun to use. When that thing hits someone you feel like you hit them. But when you use a shotgun for example you just feel like you are shooting randomly into air. I can't tell if i missed that guy or if i hit him and he just moved on as if nothing had happened...

-Its surprisingly hard to run? I don't know why my PC is having a hard time running this game but for whatever reason its having a hard time.

I mean its a good game there is nothing else to say really. Its Counter Strike, it has good AI support, the game looks good, gunplay changes between good and meh, it has the classic guns, maps and characters... I guess my only issue is the full price for it, 18,50 TL, is a bit too much. You'll probably wanna buy the Valve Complete pack to get this and a bunch of other games. If you do want only Counter Strike Source then you're better off waiting for a discount.

Este juego es realmente sorprendente, tiene una historia emocionante y cautivadora. Va muy fluido y es gráficamente excepcional. Una iluminación estupenda y unas paredes de ladrillos grafiteadas por mozárabes hacen que jugarlo sea enormemente emotivo. Mis ojos agradecen profundamente ver semejantes maravillas audiovisuales.

Me olvidaba, las físicas son legendarias, el realismo al dar cada paso, al pegar cada tiro, al caer desplomado al suelo después de ver a Shrek manteniendo relaciones sexuales con un ciervo extremeño... 

Es magnífico, os lo recomiendo. 100% recomendable.

Me encanta este juego, es muy divertido ver como nos pegamos tiros a 3 fps.

Las partidas estan llenas de enanos albinos deformes muy amables que te gritan al micro palabras que no las entiende ni su madre.

Tiene unos graficos realistas, como los de el Elden Ring, recomiendo jugarlo 100%.
Es un juego muy moderno, cuenta una historia impresionante y cautivadora, con graficos 4k full hd y fluidisimo de fps, lo he estado jugando y realmente me ha gustado, lo recomiendo 11/10.
